testcase.classname: US_005 Login page should not be accessible with invalid credentials
testcase.name: User is on the GMIBank HomePage
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the GMIBank HomePage.......................................passed When user clicks on login Drop down menu....................................passed Then user clicks on Sign in option..........................................passed And user enters a username "invalidadmin_username"..........................passed When user enters a password "validadmin_password"...........................passed And user clicks on sign in button...........................................passed And user should get Failed to sign in message...............................passed Then user verifies failed to signin message is displayed....................passed
